body: So, I was wondering if any of you guys are into Nightcore whatsoever. I personally love it, Have already made My own mix with VirtualDJ, Stick around for a tutorial on that. So, comments.!
body_tagged: So, I was wondering if any of you guys are into Nightcore whatsoever. I personally love it, Have already made My own mix with VirtualDJ, Stick around for a tutorial on that. So, comments.!
title: Avicus Nightcore Post!

replies.body: I find some nightcore good, but it depends. I know that this person likes nightcore lol
replies.body_tagged: I find some nightcore good, but it depends. I know that this person likes nightcore lol

replies.body: I'm fine with nightcore, but not exactly a fan of a majority of the nightcore community. I particularly don't like the uploaders who claim they "remixed" it, but all they did was throw it in audacity and mock other people who actually do remixes. Also not a fan of the nightcore videos where the thumbnail is a naked girl or when they copy other people's layouts. Those happen absolutely the most common, and kinda had to rant about it, but yeah I used to be big into nightcore (with one of the staff members here x3)
replies.body_tagged: I'm fine with nightcore, but not exactly a fan of a majority of the nightcore community. I particularly don't like the uploaders who claim they "remixed" it, but all they did was throw it in audacity and mock other people who actually do remixes. Also not a fan of the nightcore videos where the thumbnail is a naked girl or when they copy other people's layouts. Those happen absolutely the most common, and kinda had to rant about it, but yeah I used to be big into nightcore (with one of the staff members here x3)
